column5: TORNADO WARNINGS AND HAIL, 2 CM HAIL BALLS.  THUNDER HAS STARTED HERE ALREADY,AND WINDS ARE GETTING UP THERE.TIME TO POWER DOWN THE PC.
Just saw it on Global about the severe storm warnings between Huntsville & Parry Sound.
Thunder in Innisfil, no rain yet
It,s from here ,all the way up past Baysville  Lew.
after watching venus cross the sun last night I can't even see the sky today....LOL
Check for a update on CTV Barrie at 6:00
Just a few clouds and a tad bit of thunder in york
Just got back from Barrie, lots of odd clouds everywhere
I'm still at work.  I aint gunna power nothin down.  Let the dang thing fry!!!
:rofl2:    Hear ya Nick.
You were where?
Was only there for about 30 minutes
Huge rain drops here heavy thunder but I got the steaks off before the downpour
Sky looks ominous down here in Niagara...

Had to leave the lake early due to lightning. Sucks that I've taken the week off work to fish and it looks like there's going to be 3 straight days of thunderstorms. Hopefully tomorrow it will hold off long enough for me to catch a musky.
Muskies become VERY active and aggressive just before the storm hits and it's one of the best times to fish for them.  Just depends how close you like to be to the lightning.

lots of thunder and dark clouds with inevitable winds, and flash rain but seems to have blown over(ish) for now in Kitchener. - can anyone in the Haliburton and surrounding area keep me posted- I have a new (ish ) trailer up there and have yet to fill out the insurance papers

Wow ,weather is crazy. Came in like we were going to get hammered on. Cleared up. Went for a walk to get a hot chocolate with the mrs,a and Gizmo. Awesome sunshine. Just get back,and the dark clouds are moving in.Aint over til the night fall.
Yeah I was thinking about trying to wait out the storm on shore. Bad conditions today though before the lightning started: hot, sunny with no wind at all.
Was on the 10th floor of mom's condo for dinner tonight when this blew in.  Lots of lightening and thunder, and it poured huge drops when it got to us.
The end of the world is near!
Great photos Joey.  Nasty looking clouds in north bay too. Nothing overly serious yet though
Holy crap ... looks like a spaceship .. District 9.  Gotta love mother nature.
